original_title: Human Resources: Social engineering in the 20th century
overview: Documentary film exploring the rise of mechanistic philosphy and the exploitation of human beings under modern hierarhical systems. Topics covered include behaviorism, scientific management, work-place democracy, schooling, frustration-aggression hypothesis and human experimentation.
tagline: Give me a baby and I can make any kind of man.
title: Human Resources: Social engineering in the 20th century
